title: Perky, With Bearish Overtones: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Dec. 8, 2025

title: Every Major Bitcoin Conference Has Seen Prices Fall in 2025, Will Abu Dhabi Be Different?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin enters the Abu Dhabi conference near $92K after a year of sell-the-news dips at major events, raising questions about another potential pullback.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Reclaims $92K as Fed Rate-Cut Expectations Lift Sentiment
contentSnippet: Bitcoin pushed back above $92,000 during Monday’s Asia session as traders priced in a likely Federal Reserve rate cut this week; altcoins continued to lag.

title: Vitalik Buterin pushes for trustless gas futures market to hedge Ethereum fees, sparking debate over feasibility
contentSnippet: Researchers and builders shared doubts over whether Buterin's idea for a trustless onchain gas futures market could function effectively.

title: Global crypto ETPs log $716 million in weekly inflows amid easing negative sentiment: CoinShares
contentSnippet: It marks the second consecutive week of inflows alongside outflows from short ETPs, hinting at easing negative sentiment, CoinShares said.

title: Bitcoin’s Long-Term Holders Hit Cyclical Low as Sell Pressure Finally Eases
contentSnippet: Long-term holder supply bottomed when bitcoin sank to $80K, signaling that the wave of spot-driven selling may be nearing exhaustion as prices rebound to $90K.

title: BTC Holds Steady as Fed Rate Cut Looms, Rising Treasury Yields Suggest Caution: Analysts
contentSnippet: The Federal Reserve is expected to cut U.S. interest rates by 25 basis points on Wednesday.

title: U.S. Interest Rates, Do Kwon Sentencing: Crypto Week Ahead
contentSnippet: Your look at what's coming in the week starting Dec. 8.

title: Argentina weighs allowing domestic banks to offer crypto services
contentSnippet: Its central bank is examining changes to its existing ban that prohibits banks from trading crypto or offering crypto-related services.

title: Canadian Province Wins Forfeiture of $1M QuadrigaCX Co-Founder's Cash, Gold via Default Judgment
contentSnippet: The ruling transfers cash, gold bars, watches, and jewelry seized from a CIBC safety deposit box and bank account into government hands after Patryn did not defend the case.

title: Farcaster Switches to Wallet-First Strategy to Grow Its Social App
contentSnippet: The protocol still consists of casts, follows, reactions, identities and wallets, and third-party clients are free to emphasize whichever components they want.

title: Coinbase Reopens India Signups, Targets Fiat On-Ramp in 2026 After Two-Year Freeze
contentSnippet: Coinbase halted services entirely in 2023, off-boarded millions of Indian users and shuttered local access while reassessing regulatory exposure.

title: Robinhood to enter Indonesia by acquiring local crypto trading firm
contentSnippet: Robinhood said it is buying Indonesian brokerage PT Buana Capital Sekuritas and digital asset trader PT Pedagang Aset Kripto.

title: Farcaster shifts focus to wallet service over social app, citing growth potential
contentSnippet: In its 4.5-year run, Farcaster failed to find a sustainable growth mechanic in the social app, co-founder Dan Romero said.

title: ETH, ADA, XRP Lead Gains as Bitcoin Edges Higher on Fed Rate Cut Expectations
contentSnippet: Asian equities opened the week slightly higher ahead of a heavy run of central bank decisions, including a Federal Reserve meeting where markets have largely priced in a 25-basis-point rate cut.

title: Robinhood Eyes Indonesia Market as Local Crypto Adoption Soars
contentSnippet: Robinhood is buying a local brokerage and crypto firm as the country tightens digital finance rules and remains a leading crypto market.

title: Coinbase Reopens India Access, Sets 2026 Target for Cash-to-Crypto Purchases
contentSnippet: The move underscores Coinbase’s view of India as a long-term growth market, despite policy uncertainty in the near term.

title: Coinbase reopens app in India after two-year hiatus: report
contentSnippet: Indian users can currently trade only between cryptocurrencies, with a full fiat on-ramp expected in 2026, TechCrunch reported.

title: Bitcoin Edges Back Above $91,000 as Traders Brace for Fed Decision and Jobs Data
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is edging higher ahead of the Fed’s final rate decision and a key jobs report, extending its rebound as thin liquidity persists.

title: Bittensor’s halving next week expected to boost TAO price, Grayscale says
contentSnippet: By reducing token emissions, the halving is poised to be a positive catalyst for TAO price, a Grayscale analyst said.

title: ZKsync to Retire Its Original Ethereum Rollup Next Year
contentSnippet: ZKsync is retiring its original Lite network, formalizing a shift toward ZKsync Era and the ZK Stack as activity on the legacy rollup fades.

title: ZKsync to deprecate ZKsync Lite in 2026, sunsetting Ethereum’s first ZK rollup
contentSnippet: ZKsync plans to consolidate its focus on systems built with the ZK Stack, Prividiums, and the broader ZKsync network after sunsetting ZKsync Lite.

title: Canada targets Dapper Labs users in second-ever crypto tax probe as enforcement gap widens: report
contentSnippet: With a court order, Canada's tax service obtained data on 2,500 Dapper Labs users, though the CRA originally asked for data on 18,000 people.

title: Why Tokenized Assets Can't Flourish Without Liquidity: Securitize CEO
contentSnippet: Accessibility isn’t the only factor shaping a wave of tokenized assets, according to Securitize co-founder and CEO Carlos Domingo.

title: Aztec Network raises over $60 million in ETH with community-first token sale, testing new auction model
contentSnippet: Privacy-focused Ethereum L2 Aztec's token sale was the first public test of the Continuous Clearing Auction mechanism developed jointly with Uniswap Labs.

title: Getting Started With Myriad
contentSnippet: Myriad's prediction market ecosystem enables you to make predictions using USDC. Here’s how to get set up and start using it.

title: Buy the Bitcoin Dip? Why Ric Edelman Still Thinks Portfolios Should Hold Up to 40% Crypto
contentSnippet: Ric Edelman isn’t budging from the Bitcoin investment strategies he urged six months ago, even as BTC lingers far from record-breaking heights.

title: From Paper to Code: The Future of Tokenization with Carlos Domingo
contentSnippet: Securitize co-founder and CEO Carlos Domingo delves into the nuances of tokenization, from its potential benefits to the industry's failed experiments.

title: Crypto Holiday Gift Guide 2025
contentSnippet: At a loss for what to buy the crypto fan in your life this festive season? Look no further than Decrypt’s holiday gift guide.

title: Professor Coin: When Bitcoin Sneezes—How Crypto and Equities Caught the Same Cold
contentSnippet: Academic literature finds that during periods of economic stress, correlations and spillovers between cryptocurrencies and equities spike.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
